---
title: "info_buttons_templates"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny
---


```{r}

# Show information templates used. 

# Add action button and style it. 

actionButton(inputId = "info_template", 
             label = "",
             class = "btn-xs",
             icon = icon("info-circle", verify_fa = FALSE),
             style = "background-color: #337ab7; 
                      border: 2px solid #8CBBD2; 
                      border-radius: 5px")


# Show information about the DMP templates.

observeEvent(input$info_template, {
  
  showModal(
    modalDialog(title = "Information on templates",
                easyClose = TRUE,
                footer = NULL,
                tags$div(
                         tags$p(strong("DMP templates: "),
                                "While there may be a variety of DMP templates available in,
                                this dashboard focuses specifically on the 
                                templates listed below:"),
                          tags$ul(
                                  tags$li(strong("Template 2021: "), 
                                          "First DMP template, Data released: 
                                          2020-01-01, Date unpublished: 2022-12-01"),
                                  tags$li(strong("Template 2022 :"),
                                          "Second DMP template, Data released: 
                                          2022-12-01, Date unpublished: 2024-01-01"),
                                  tags$li(strong("Template 2024 :"), 
                                          "Current DMP template, Data released: 
                                          2024-01-01"),
                                  )
                         )
                )
          )
})

```
